item.title: How or what should i use to make serverstatus page?
item.dc:creator: @M4G3OWNS M4G3OWNS
item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:10, topic:56320”][quote author=usernamelol link=topic=80071.msg883547#msg883547 date=1171100719]

its php

<?php $html=file_get_contents('url'); if($html == ""){ echo "server down"; }elese{ echo "server up"; } ?>

My Friend wants to know if there is a way to make it say in a dynamic sig?
[/quote]
If he made a website with php that wrote it to a png file or a picture file then he could just put the picture in his sig.[/quote]

then i guess ill just have to some how i have no idea how but try make my own page - i got alota php to learn

Read full topic
item.source: How or what should i use to make serverstatus page?

item.title: How or what should i use to make serverstatus page?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:9, topic:56320”][quote author=Bang Train link=topic=80071.msg880847#msg880847 date=1171043639]
its php

<?php $html=file_get_contents('url'); if($html == ""){ echo "server down"; }elese{ echo "server up"; } ?>

[/quote]
My Friend wants to know if there is a way to make it say in a dynamic sig?[/quote]
If he made a website with php that wrote it to a png file or a picture file then he could just put the picture in his sig.

Read full topic
